title: "emm_chunk"
output: html_document

```{r echo=FALSE,results='hide'}
source("../../R/functions.R")
```


Print the estimate expected means, SE, df and confidence intervals of the precicted dependent variable by factors in the model. When ``r opt("Include covariates")` is selected, factors levels are crossed also with the conditiong levels of the continuous variables (if any). The conditioning values are selected in `r opt("Covariates Scaling")` panel.
